1.title: Episode #1.1

episode of.title: The jump: on the piste (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Cherry Healey chats to the first two male celebrities to be eliminated from the competition. Plus she has the inside scoop on the the hair-raising women's skeleton.

2.title: Episode #1.2

episode of.title: The jump: on the piste (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: It's ladies' night as Cherry has a girly gossip with the first two female celebrities eliminated from The Jump.

3.title: Episode #1.3

episode of.title: The jump: on the piste (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: In a warm up to the evening's main event, Cherry gets a look at the thrilling celebrity head-to-head - the parallel slalom.

4.title: Episode #1.4

episode of.title: The jump: on the piste (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Cherry Healey talks bruises, bumps and backstage banter with the latest celebrity to be eliminated from The Jump.

5.title: Episode #1.5

episode of.title: The jump: on the piste (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Cherry Healey is out on the slopes with the latest celebrity to be eliminated and gets the inside scoop on the ski cross and air jump.

6.title: Episode #1.6

episode of.title: The jump: on the piste (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: It's the end of an action packed week, and Cherry looks back at the dramatic events, jumps and falls that have taken place so far.

7.title: Episode #1.7

episode of.title: The jump: on the piste (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: With the semi-final coming up, expect some Alpine antics with The Jump's family of celebs, winter sport experts, and friends and family supporters.

8.title: Episode #1.8

episode of.title: The jump: on the piste (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: It's the night of the final, and Cherry Healey is on hand with all the build-up and the last minute nerves and tension backstage.
